name: Sudoku 2022
description:
Classic sudoku for everyone! Enjoy the Sudoku World 🌍 with more than 20 000 free puzzles in your pocket, train your brain and use lots of handy features:

✔ Super clean✨and comfy game board,
✔ Five puzzle difficulty levels - do it easy, medium, hard, expert, or unbeatable Invictus! 🥋
✔ Magic Pencil ⭐- auto-fill all pencil notes or change layouts with just one gesture,
✔ Rank your puzzle time 🎯 among the other players,
✔ Themes - choose the color theme 🎨 that makes it easier for your eyes,
✔ Track your skill growth 💪 with a super clean time chart,
✔ Play Sudoku Puzzles online and offline.

So, play FREE classic sudoku game now!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mnemonemo.sudoku

Visit our website - sudoked.com
